index-content.head_title: .NET, Java APIs & Online Document Assembly Apps by GroupDocs
index-content.head_description: Get all-in-one Document Automation & Reporting Solution for .NET and Java applications. Generate all common documents from custom templates and data.
index-content.title: Document Automation and Reporting Solution
index-content.description_1: Easily create detailed reports using templates and data sources with our cross-platform apps and APIs.
index-content.description_2: Generate reports in formats like Word, Excel, Presentations, and many more using templates with flexible markup.
index-content.description_3: Populate charts, barcodes, tables, and other elements with data from sources like JSON, XML, CSV, etc.

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} key features
features.description: This solution helps you create reports in popular document formats, automatically filled with your business data. Easily automate your document generation tasks.

feature_1.title: Populate templates with data
feature_1.content: Fill reports using data from supported sources.

feature_2.title: Flexible markup
feature_2.content: Add data to documents in a customizable way.

feature_3.title: Native document features
feature_3.content: Display data using tables, charts, and barcodes.

feature_4.title: All popular formats
feature_4.content: Supports all commonly used document formats.

formats.title: Supports 50+ file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with nearly all popular file formats

sample_index.title: Using Generated Barcodes
sample_index.content: {{ProdShortName}} allows barcode markup in report templates. When creating a report, a barcode is generated based on the markup and provided data. Specify the path to the template containing the text, data objects, and markup. Also, specify the data source to fill the barcode with content.

actions.title: Ready to Get Started?
actions.description: Try the features of {{ProdShortName}} for free or request a license.
actions.description_index: Test {{ProdShortName}} features for free on your platform.

item_1.question: Does {{ProdShortName}} require any external libraries for document composing?
item_1.answer: No, {{ProdShortName}} works independently and does not require third-party libraries like Adobe Acrobat or Microsoft Office.

item_2.question: Can I test {{ProdShortName}} features before purchasing?
item_2.answer: Yes, you can! {{ProdShortName}} offers a free trial. Install it and explore its features. The trial version adds 'trial badges' to your documents and only processes the first 3 pages. For the full experience, get a free 30-day temporary license to access all features. More details are available under [temporary license]({{LicensingUrl}}).

item_3.question: What types of licenses are available?
item_3.answer: Looking for a {{ProdShortName}} license? We offer a variety of options to suit your needs. Choose based on your team size, deployment location (single office or remote), and whether you need to share the SDK/API with clients for distribution. Alternatively, choose a monthly usage license with metered plans—pay only for what you use. Find the best option for you under [pricing]({{PricingUrl}}).

cloud_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Low-Code APIs
cloud_links.description: Generate documents using your application through our cloud-based REST API.

item_1.content: Use the cURL RESTful API to add data to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and many other templates.

item_2.content: Enhance your .NET applications by generating reports through the Cloud SDK. Display business data in your custom format.

item_3.content: {{ProdShortName}} SDK offers different options for Java applications to generate various types of documents.

app_links.title: {{ProdShortName}} Web Apps
app_links.description: {{ProdShortName}} offers a free web application for generating documents. You can process more than 50 popular file formats directly in your browser, FOR FREE.

item_1.content: Generate reports in Excel, Word, PowerPoint, and many other file types directly from your web browser.

item_2.content: Create Microsoft Word documents from templates and data sources.

item_3.content: Upload a template and a data source to generate Excel reports for free.

index-content-net.head_title: .NET API for Document Automation, Assembly & Report Generation
index-content-net.head_description: C# .NET API for document automation, assembly, and report generation. Create PDF, Word, Excel, PPTX, HTML, and email documents from custom templates.
index-content-net.title: .NET Document Automation & Reporting API
index-content-net.description: Generate reports in .NET applications by defining templates and merging data.
index-content-net.code_title: Fill a Chart in DOCX Using C#
index-content-net.overview_description: .NET solution for automating document creation with advanced data integration.

overview_feature_1.title: Add Business Data to Document Templates with C#
overview_feature_1.description: Report generation made easy: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can effortlessly insert data from sources like JSON or XML into predefined templates.

overview_feature_2.title: Process Native Data Objects
overview_feature_2.description: Supported document types include embedded objects like diagrams, charts, tables, and lists that can be populated automatically with data.

overview_feature_3.title: Additional Features
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides extensive customization options. Programmatically design data objects, generate barcodes, use online data sources via URLs, and save output in various formats.

features.title: {{ProdShortName}} Features
features.description: Create documents and reports using advanced data models.

feature_1.title: Advanced Data Representation
feature_1.content: Supports a wide range of data objects such as charts, lists, tables, images, and more.

feature_2.title: Data Manipulation
feature_2.content: Apply formulas and sequential operations to format and display data effectively.

feature_3.title: Wide Range of Supported Formats
feature_3.content: Work seamlessly with all common document formats for templates or output files.

feature_4.title: Rich Template Markup
feature_4.content: Leverage ordinal, cardinal, and alphabetic numeric formatting in templates.

feature_5.title: Embed Barcodes
feature_5.content: Generate barcode images dynamically and insert them into your documents.

feature_6.title: Data Formatting
feature_6.content: Format strings in templates as uppercase, lowercase, capitalized, or first-letter capital styles.

feature_7.title: Document Content Manipulation
feature_7.content: Dynamically insert content from external documents into your reports.

feature_8.title: Save in Multiple Formats
feature_8.content: Specify the output file format using file extensions or detailed configurations.

feature_9.title: Flexible Data Processing
feature_9.content: Insert images and documents dynamically using Base64-encoded bytes.

index-content-net.platforms_description: {{ProdFullName}} is compatible with the following operating systems, frameworks, and package managers.
index-content-net.code_title_sample_1: Bulleted List in a Microsoft Word Document
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_1_content_1: [Bulleted lists](https://docs.groupdocs.com/assembly/net/bulleted-list-in-word-processing-document/) are a common way to present business data.
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_1_content_2: Here's an example of adding a list to a Word document using {{ProdShortName}}.
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_2_content_1: You can create [Pie Charts](https://docs.groupdocs.com/assembly/net/pie-chart-in-presentation-document/) using templates and XML data.
index-content-net.code_samples_sample_2_content_2: Enhance your reports with visually appealing data representations.

index-content-java.head_title: Java Library for Document Creation, Automation & Reporting
index-content-java.head_description: Java library for automating document creation and generating reports. Create PDF, Word, Excel, PPTX, HTML, and email documents using custom templates.
index-content-java.title: Java API for Automating Reports and Documents
index-content-java.description: Simplify report generation in Java by merging data with templates.
index-content-java.code_title: Generate a Chart in DOCX with Java
index-content-java.overview_description: A Java library designed for automated document creation and seamless data integration.

overview_feature_1.title: Merge Business Data into Templates with Java
overview_feature_1.description: Easily create professional reports by embedding data from JSON, XML, or other sources into pre-designed templates using {{ProdFullName}}.

overview_feature_2.title: Work with Embedded Objects
overview_feature_2.description: Automatically populate elements like tables, charts, and diagrams in documents using data from external sources.

overview_feature_3.title: Advanced Customization
overview_feature_3.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers flexible features like generating barcodes, pulling online data through URLs, and exporting output in different formats.

features.title: Key Capabilities of {{ProdShortName}}
features.description: Create professional documents and reports with advanced data handling.

feature_1.title: Visual Data Elements
feature_1.content: Add and format elements like charts, tables, images, and lists directly in your documents.

feature_2.title: Data Transformation
feature_2.content: Use formulas, sorting, and other tools to organize and present your data effectively.

feature_3.title: Support for Multiple Formats
feature_3.content: Easily work with common file types for both templates and output files.

feature_4.title: Enhanced Template Formatting
feature_4.content: Customize templates with numeric, alphabetic, and other advanced formatting options.

feature_5.title: Dynamic Barcode Generation
feature_5.content: Quickly create and insert barcode images into documents as needed.

feature_6.title: Flexible Text Styling
feature_6.content: Apply text transformations like uppercase, lowercase, title case, or other styles in templates.

feature_7.title: Import External Content
feature_7.content: Embed content from external files dynamically while generating documents.

feature_8.title: Export in Multiple Formats
feature_8.content: Save final documents in various file formats using specified extensions or configurations.

feature_9.title: Dynamic Media Embedding
feature_9.content: Insert images or other content using Base64-encoded data during document creation.

index-content-java.platforms_description: {{ProdFullName}} works seamlessly with popular operating systems, development frameworks, and package managers.
index-content-java.code_samples_description: Explore sample code for common tasks with {{ProdShortName}}.
index-content-java.code_title_sample_1: Create a Bulleted List in Word
index-content-java.code_samples_sample_1_content_1: Learn how to add [bulleted lists](https://docs.groupdocs.com/assembly/java/bulleted-list-in-word-processing-document/) to Word documents for organized data representation.
index-content-java.code_samples_sample_1_content_2: This example shows how to generate a list in Word using {{ProdShortName}}.
index-content-java.code_samples_sample_2_content_1: Use templates and XML to add [pie charts](https://docs.groupdocs.com/assembly/java/pie-chart-in-presentation-document/) to your presentations.
index-content-java.code_samples_sample_2_content_2: Make your reports more engaging by including pie charts to visualize data.
